channel.title: Morning Score
channel.description: Delivered every Monday by 10 a.m., Weekly Score is your guide to the year-round campaign cycle.

item.title: One Democrat's plan to bring back rural voters
item.description: It’s an approach that fits squarely into Democrats’ attempts to retool their economic messaging.
item.dc:creator: By Lisa Kashinsky and Andrew Howard
item.dc:contributor: By Lisa Kashinsky and Andrew Howard

item.title: Where the redistricting fight stands (for now)
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: The next Democrat Indivisible wants to boot from Congress
item.description: Ed Case has long been a target of his party’s left flank.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: All politics is… national?
item.description: An increasingly bifurcated electorate leads candidates and ad makers to focus less and less on localized concerns and more on national politics.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: The closing arguments
item.description: POLITICO analyzed the most frequently aired television ads — based on data from the ad tracker AdImpact — in each race between Oct. 24 and Oct. 31.
item.dc:creator: By Samuel Benson

item.title: Why both parties think they’ll win the House
item.description: The parties are pointing to very different metrics in order to make the case.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: How one Dem group is rethinking canvassing
item.description: The initiative comes as Democrats try to course-correct after their sweeping losses last November.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: Pennsylvania’s high-stakes retention election
item.description: In order for Republicans to flip the court, they need voters to unseat at least two of the three justices ahead of the next court election in 2027.
item.dc:creator: By Andrew Howard

item.title: Why Democrats have hope in a deep-red Tennessee district
item.description: The race is far from a sure bet.
item.dc:creator: By Cassandra Dumay and Andrew Howard
item.dc:contributor: By Cassandra Dumay and Andrew Howard
